story_23_05000/2401_1001_0200_10: How do I put this...? When I used my sync move...
story_23_05000/2401_1001_0300_10: it felt like I was one with Sylveon.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_0500_10: That was the feeling of...being a Pokémon.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
It was the feeling of your hearts becoming one.
That’s the answer.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Sync moves happen only when a Trainer’s heart
and mind are in sync with their Pokémon’s.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
In that moment, your hearts are connected and
beat as one.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_0900_10:
I know it’s not exactly what you’re looking for, but
that’s what it means to become a Pokémon here
on Pasio.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: That’s what it means to become a Pokémon...
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1100_10:
I see. On Pasio, you and your Pokémon can unite
your hearts and minds, and when you do, it feels
like you’ve become your Pokémon.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1200_10:
My, that’s wonderful. Just wonderful. I’m really
interested in Pokémon battles on Pasio now.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1300_10: Fwahaha! Glad to hear it, Valerie!
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Hee hee. It’s good to see Valerie so happy.
Thank you, Leaf.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Of course! I can’t have anyone trying to actually
turn into a Pokémon like Bill did.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Though I guess that’d be interesting in its
own way.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1700_10: I’m in your debt, everyone. Thank you.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
It might be a bit too soon, but I’d like to get even
closer with Sylveon right away.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_1900_10:
Elesa, would you please do me the favor of
battling me?
story_23_05000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Actually, Valerie, you should think about joining
[Name:PlayerNickname ]’s team.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_2300_10:
The round three pairings for the finals were just
revealed. My team is battling...
story_23_05000/2401_1001_2700_10:
Hee hee. That’s right. Our shining battle will be
on the stage of the PML...
story_23_05000/2401_1001_2800_10:
So, your team will get to battle with Elesa next,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_23_05000/2401_1001_2900_10:
Oh my! I suppose I’ll just have to join your team
then, won’t I?
story_23_05000/2401_1001_3000_10:
That way, I can have a battle with Elesa on the
greatest stage imaginable!
story_23_05000/2401_1001_3100_10: Oh, well, only if that’s all right with everyone else.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Of course! It’s certainly a bit sudden, but we’d
be glad to have you, Valerie!
story_23_05000/2401_1001_3400_10:
Fwahahaha! It seems we’ve gained yet another
strong-willed ally.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_3500_10:
We welcome you with open arms!
Isn’t that right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
story_23_05000/2401_0401_3800_10: Thank you. Sylveon and I will do our best!
story_23_05000/2401_0402_4200_10: Hee hee. I think we’ll get along quite well.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_4300_10: I’ll be waiting for you in round three, then.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_4400_10:
I should get going, too.
My teammates are probably waiting for me.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_4500_10:
Don’t go losing now, OK? I’m looking forward to
a battle with you, too!
story_23_05000/2401_1001_4700_10:
Elesa...
And Leaf is still in the running, too...
story_23_05000/2401_1001_4800_10:
After their battle, Elesa and Leaf both talked about
how they still had an ace up their sleeve.
I’m eager to see what they meant.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Me, too. I’m really looking forward to the
coming battles.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_5000_10:
I want to go all out, too, so let’s be sure to give it
everything we’ve got.
story_23_05000/2401_1001_5100_10:
Yeah! We’ll take down any team that dares to take
us on!
story_23_05000/2401_1001_5200_10: I’m sure we can do it together!
